events.message: I placed an order over two weeks ago and it still hasn't arrived. The tracking info hasn't updated for days, and I am very frustrated with the delay in shipping.
The customer's message indicates a delivery delay issue due to lack of tracking updates and late arrival.
Assigning the case to the delivery support team to investigate the reported shipment delay and tracking problem.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand your order has been delayed and the tracking information is not updating. Let me help you with this.
Could you please provide your order number and the shipping address so I can look into the status with the courier?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and it was shipped to 45 Oak Street, Springfield. I hope this helps you find out what happened with it.
Thank you for the info. I contacted the courier and they confirmed a temporary delay due to weather issues. Your package is expected to arrive within the next 3 days.
Thanks for the update. It's reassuring to know when to expect the package. I appreciate your help in checking this out.
Glad I could assist. We've marked the delivery delay issue as resolved now, but please contact us if the package does not arrive within the given timeframe.
Just checking in to confirm that your package has arrived and everything is satisfactory with your order.
Yes, the package arrived yesterday. Everything is perfect. Thank you for your support and timely updates.
We are happy to hear your order arrived safely. Closing this case now. Thank you for choosing our service!
Please take a moment to complete a short survey about your experience with our support team today.
